name: Bandapes
description:
🙈 Bandapes is a rhythmic battle game where you take position of a band leader and play the drums to guide your squad of apes to victory!

♪♪♪ each ape listens to different drum patterns ♪♪♪

🙊 so try looking out for patterns/apes that fit well together so you can quickly dish out the right commands.

🙉 you battle against the bands of other players, which are controlled by an AI that plays like the real player would (almost)!

Features
  • ~1 hour playtime
  • asynchronous online multiplayer
  • 6 different apes each with different abilities
  • the apes can wear hats 👒🎩
  • 10 different hats to find




🐒🐒🐒 there are 6 different types of apes each with a special move! 🐒🐒🐒


Controls

play with mouse
or, while in battle, play the drums with 1 - 4
